summary: AN ORDINANCE granting to Seattle University, its successors and assigns, authority to construct, maintain and operate certain steam mains or appurtenances in, under and across East Columbia Street from 12th Avenue to 14th Avenue and 14th Avenue from East Columbia Street to East Jefferson Street and other streets and avenues, and authorizing the Board of Public Works to issue permits in connection therewith, and requiring the filing of a certain bond.
